Name: PLANET RESERVE
About the game: new version .... Better graphics, better sound, several difficulty levels. Those who already have it will reload the game. those who don't have it encourage them to get it ... I hope you like it high level difficulty shooting game, the game contains 3 scenes, the first one is in a swamp you will have to kill jigging insects, the second scene will be on land and your enemies will be dinosaurs, and the third scene will be in the mine YOUR MISSION IS TO FINISH WITH AN INLEGAL MINING EXPLOITATION IN A PLANET RESERVE ANIMAL, YOU HAVE A SUIT OF ENERGY THAT PROTECTS YOU. THERE ARE DISTRIBUTED ENERGY BATTERIES FOR THE COSTUME TO CONTINUE PROTECTING YOU. YOU HAVE A NORMAL AND ONE MORE POWERFUL SHOT THAT REMOVES YOU LITTLE LUCK ENERGY ... beware of the local fauna ......
